author: Alim Kheraj
title: Britney Spears found some dresses and did what anyone would â€” a mini-fashion show
text:
Britney Spears found some dresses and did what anyone would â€” a mini-fashion show Weâ€™ve all had that moment where weâ€™re rooting through our closets, or through those suitcases of clothes that you keep under your bed, and found a couple of outfits that you forgot about. Well, it happened to Britney Spears, so she decided to do a fashion show to celebrate!
Having just returned to Las Vegas for her wildly successful â€œBritney: Piece of Meâ€ residency following a family trip to Orlando (which, tbh, looked like the MOST FUN EVER), it seems that Britney found some dresses she hadnâ€™t worn for a while.
In typical fun Britney style, the signer decided that the only thing for it was to host a mini-fashion show, because what else would you do? Sharing a video of her walking down a corridor in her rented Vegas home (set to â€œChange Your Mind (No Seas Cortes)â€ from her ninth album Glory) , Brit showcased three dresses, writing:
â€œBack in Vegas! Found these dresses today and just had to play â€ Back in Vegas! Found these dresses today and just had to play ğŸ¦‹ğŸ¦‹ğŸ¦‹ 
A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Mar 22, 2017 at 4:51pm PDT 
Seriously, we love that Britney manages to have the most fun, and is sharing these cute moments with us.
In fact, this isnâ€™t the first time that Britney Spears has shared her mini-fashion shows with us. The star has walked the runway a few times recently, werking it, and rocking some pretty cute outfits, too.
Option 1 or option 2? #ootd 
A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Mar 17, 2017 at 5:35pm PDT 
WALK WALK FASHION BABY!
She even showcased her love for BeyoncÃ© , soundtracking one of the videos to â€œHold Upâ€ from Beyâ€™s Lemonade .
Another day, another runway 
A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Mar 5, 2017 at 2:54pm PST 
Indeed, the runway videos all kicked off two weeks ago, when Brit shared the following.
Just doing my own runway show 
A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Mar 2, 2017 at 10:36pm PST 
While Britney might be really into putting on fashion shows at the moment, the star hasnâ€™t stopped her usual dedication to posting yoga memes, and funny pictures to Instagram. Following her most recent runway walk, Brit also shared a picture that said â€œI may love to shop but Iâ€™m not buying your bullshit.â€ 
A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Mar 22, 2017 at 7:18pm PDT 
LOL!
Itâ€™s so great to see Britney Spears just having fun and being playful, and tbh we think we could all take a leaf out of her book. Life is too short not to hold makeshift fashion shows in your home, so weâ€™re off to raid the closet and model our finest!
